title: InputPartitionSelection
description: A specification of which values from an InputSpacePartition must be exercised within a CoverageRequirement, supporting selective coverage of equivalence classes per IEEE 829-2008 test design specification. When coverAllCategories is true, all partition values are included except those in excludeValues; otherwise, only the values listed in coverValues are included.

partitionRef.description: ID of the testing.inputspacepartition from which values are being selected for coverage.

coverValues.description: Comma-separated labels or IDs of specific partition values to include in coverage. Ignored when coverAllCategories is true.

coverAllCategories.description: When true, all partition values are included in coverage except those listed in excludeValues. Overrides coverValues.

excludeValues.description: Comma-separated labels or IDs of partition values to exclude from coverage. Applied when coverAllCategories is true to carve out specific values.
